Job Description:
Working on several new product lines in parallel with our existing products. As such, we are looking for young, enthusiastic, committed Test Automation engineers, who can help us in our endeavor to build the best in class Enterprise software products, with a very fast and aggressive outlook.
Responsibilities
Work side by side with the development team, design team and product team.
Attend most of the requirement discussions in the product conceptualization phase.
Would be responsible for ensuring quality of all deliverables right from the initial stages of product development.
Responsible for executing functional testing and ensuring complete test coverage as per requirements.
Ability to understand master test plan and project plan.
Create or assist in creating own test plan.
Generate test cases based on the requirements and other documents.
Set up the required test environments.
Create or assist in creating assigned test automation.
Test software releases by executing associated test cases.
Report test results and defects to the stakeholders.
Create, debug test logs and attend to bug reports and resolve defects.
Update test cases and test automation based on the discovered defects.
Report work progress and any problems faced to the Test Lead, Module Lead or Project
Manager as required.
Execute performance and stress tests at regular intervals.
Well versed with web platform, mobile/iPad applications, data mining, real-time optimization algorithms, ad-serving platforms and SaaS.
Requirements
Bachelor s degree in Computer Science or related field.
Experience-7 to 10 yrs
Excellent relationship management skills, analytical skills must be metrics driven.
Strong organizational skills and the ability to prioritize and work on projects with great efficiency and attention to detail.
Graduate from a top tier institute.
Agile Rapid prototype testing and Functional testing.
Well-equipped in Web based application and Linux/Unix environment.
Exposure to Performance testing, Stress and Load testing.
Experience in JMeter, Relational and Non-Relational databases, Automation (backend with scripts and UI with well-known tools) will be an added advantage
Keywords: Unix, Automation, Linux, Functional testing, Performance testing, Agile, Test planning, Test cases, Data mining

Job Description:
We are looking for senior and junior software testing engineers to join our QA team. As a software testing engineer, you will be responsible for evaluating software functions and designing test protocols to ensure that products work as intended. You will also be responsible for completing all testing procedures, suggesting performance changes, and preparing performance reports for the product and RD managers.
The successful candidate should have advanced knowledge in software design and engineering, a good eye for detail, and a natural gift for software troubleshooting. A skilled software test engineer should be able to identify even the smallest flaw in software designs and suggest simple yet effective fixes.
Responsibilities:
Meet with product and RD managers to discuss software specifications and controls.
Use the software as intended to analyze its functional properties.
Design manual and automated test procedures to evaluate each software product.
Building, coding, and implementing software evaluation test programs.
Running test programs to ensure that testing protocols evaluate the software correctly.
Tweaking the software testing systems for maximum performance. Finalizing and documenting testing procedures. Completing final tests and creating test reports. Presenting test reports to management and suggesting software fixes.
Requirements:
Bachelor s degree in computer science, software engineering, or similar field.
Proven work experience as a software test engineer.
In-depth knowledge of program testing software including Bugzilla and selenium.
Advanced knowledge of debugging codes and software development languages.
Experience working with popular operating systems including Windows and Linux.
Strong attention to detail. Ability to collect data and compile test reports.
Excellent software troubleshooting skills.
Ability to design and write complex software testing procedures.
Keywords: Software testing, Software design, Linux, Coding, Debugging, Windows, Selenium, Bugzilla, Software troubleshooting

Job Title: UAV and Robotics Software Engineer in Test
Job Description:
As part of the Quality Engineering organization you will support and champion MathWorks primary goal of delivering high quality software to our customers:
Design, code, debug, and maintain automated test suites for algorithms and tools implemented in MATLAB and Simulink for Autonomous UAVs and Robots.
Participate in design reviews and code reviews; develop test strategies for new features, authoring test plans and test procedures; ensure testability of features, engaging with developers throughout the design phase.
Implement automated tests and test-tooling that validates software functionality and protects against regressions. Perform bug analysis, review and triage bugs, work with Engineering and management to categorize and prioritize.
Partner with developers to develop comprehensive test strategies including unit, sub-system and system-level testing.
Drive continuous improvement to the quality of MathWorks products and processes
Minimum Qualifications
A bachelors degree and 5 years of professional work experience (or a masters degree, or equivalent experience) is required.
Additional Qualifications
Knowledge of Autonomous Systems.
Knowledge of Path/motion Planning related algorithms.
Experience in verification & validation of Autonomous UAVs and Robotics.
Experience with any of the open source tools like ROS, Robotics Simulators such as Gazebo.
Keywords: Automation testing, Process improvement, Quality engineering, Software development life cycle, Simulink, Open source, Continuous improvement, MATLAB, Robotics, Testing

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Software Test Engineer to join our dynamic team
In this role, you will play a critical part in ensuring the quality and reliability of our multi-tier SaaS products, spanning desktop, web-based, plugin-based, and mobile-based clients on the C#/
NET/SQL Server technology stack
Your responsibilities will encompass designing, implementing, and executing automated testing suites, conducting meticulous API testing for seamless integration, and creating reusable test harnesses and modules
Your expertise in managing multiple priorities, mentoring junior team members, and delivering high-quality products within Agile and SAFe methodologies will be crucial to our success
If you thrive in a challenging environment, excel at solving complex problems, and are dedicated to continuous improvement, we invite you to be part of our team and contribute to our mission of delivering top-notch software solutions
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Design, implement, and execute key automated testing suites within multi-tier SaaS products with desktop/web-based, plugin-based, mobile-based clients on the C#/.NET/SQL Server technology stack.
Conduct thorough API testing to ensure seamless integration and data exchange.
Design, build, and test high quality reusable automated test harnesses and modules.
Develop and support automated unit, system, performance, and load test harnesses and modules.
Leverage continuous build and automated test frameworks as well as experience delivering high quality products on time while working in Agile Teams and following Agile + SAFe methodologies.
Individual tasks within a work team, using the ability to manage multiple priorities and generate innovative problem-solving solutions.
Works towards solving complex problems independently.
Mentor less-experienced staff in their career development.
Generates innovative approaches and solutions to recurring problems.
Estimates efforts, such as schedules and costs, for individual tasks.
Improves efficiencies and reduces costs through adherence and enhancements to project management methodologies.
Manages individual career development; initiates career development discussions with manager.
Required Qualifications:
Bachelor s degree in computer science or equivalent work experience.
6+ years of experience in the software industry (QA and/or Development).
3+ years of automation experience building maintainable automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium, QTP, Ruby, or Perl).
3+ years experience testing client facing software.
3+ years experience designing, building, and testing high quality reusable automated test harnesses and modules.
Demonstrates aptitude for analytical problem-solving.
3+ years experience documenting defects, reproduction steps, RCAs, and producing technical documentation.
3+ years experience troubleshooting technical issues with internal or external customers.
3+ years experience with TFS.
5+ years experience with test automation tools.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience with testing commercial client facing software.
Experience implementing designs and provides feedback on the development process.
Experience developing and supporting automated unit, system, performance, and load test suites.
Experience leveraging continuous build and automated test frameworks.
Experiencing evaluating and improving the interactions and processes with an Agile Development team.
Experience using Microsoft Test Manager a plus.
Experience with testing Microservices a plus.
Keywords: Computer science, Project management, Perl, Selenium, QTP, microsoft, Troubleshooting, Ruby, SQL, Technical documentation

Job Description:
The tester works closely with the IT/Development Team and the Production Team. A single common goal: quality of service and customer satisfaction. One for all, all for one!
You manage the changes induced by the evolutions of the different applications/components of the SWIFT Hub Platform Suite of applications. You regularly update the documentation like test strategy, test books, test data, product verification report to adapt it for the cases encountered for testing.
As part of your test validation, the certification is a guarantee of the quality of the releases that will be deployed in production. Anomalies may give rise to incidents whose consequences may be significant if not identified early during the testing.
This requires organization, rigor and control of the risks associated with our activities. Teamwork and mutual aid are part of your daily life. You contribute to sharing information and knowledge with your colleagues, thus continuing to develop your skills on a daily basis

Profile required
Based on the detailed functional specifications, analyze the evolution of the platform s tools and establish the testing strategy scenarios
Configure the technical and functional elements of the various tools in the homologation environment to aid with the testing
Prepare and write test books for all the scenarios and datasets respective to each scenario
Carry out the test campaigns, deliver and track the progress with the expected documentation like Acceptance Books, Release Notes, Product Verification etc.
Maintain and map the Test Evidence repository for all the test scenarios
Support Production team for analysis investigation of incident by reproducing them in UAT and with testing for any production fixes.
Maintain the Homologation Platform on a daily basis
Certified Bachelor s Degree or equivalent (IT field appreciated)
Worked in international team or Test teams with exchange across different stakeholder/teams
Team-player while remaining independent
Taking up on challenges
Exploring, Proposing and Challenging new ideas
Good documentation, reporting, escalation in case of risk of meeting milestones.
Preferably Knowledgeable in financial exchanges, products protocols from SWIFT (Swiftnet, SWIFT Alliance, FIN/MX/FA/Browse, RT/SnF, etc.)
Keywords: Test strategy, Trade union, Customer satisfaction, Finance, Test scenarios, Genetics, Swift, Information technology, Testing

You will have the opportunity to work on projects related to [mention specific areas or projects such as web development, mobile app development, etc], with a focus on JAVA/ PHP/ Testing technologies
Key Responsibilities
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and objectives
Develop, test, and maintain high-quality software applications using JAVA/ PHP/ Testing technologies
Participate in code reviews, debugging, and troubleshooting to ensure software reliability and performance
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following best practices and coding standards
Document software designs, implementation details, and technical specifications
Assist in the identification and resolution of software defects and issues
Contribute to the improvement of development processes and methodologies
Stay up-to-date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices
Keywords: Intern, Coding, Java J2Ee Developer, Software Development Manager, Web development, Debugging, PHP, Troubleshooting, Application software, Testing

Job Description:
We are looking for a Senior Test Software Development Engineer (SDET) who will be responsible for maintaining the existing test automation environment and introducing new improvements to the project.
Our current UI test automation solution covers web portals using Selenium, so knowledge of Web Driver tool is mandatory.
Successful candidate will also be involved in CI process, test creation, analysis and improvements, production releases support.
In this role, you will
Automate test cases for Web portals and microservices using Selenium Web driver for IDS projects (Invisalign Doctor site)
Develop new and support existing auto testing scripts (refactoring and updates)
Take part in improving and automating the CI/CD process
Evaluate engineering functional specification and other project documentation, compose and execute test cases to fully verify the correctness of functionality.
Lead complex technical projects (including assessment of testing scope, planning and monitoring of testing progress, preparation of testing documentation)
Configure and run auto tests, analyze auto testing execution reports
Create bug reports according to auto tests execution results, track fixes for these defects
Participate in project releases delivery to production (on demand)
Participate in code review
Be a mentor for junior and middle level QA engineers
In this role, you'll need
At least 5 years of experience in Testing Automation of Web
Experience of Python/Java/C# language experience
Strong knowledge of Object Oriented Development, Page Object and other design patterns
Strong proven Selenium WebDriver knowledge
Proven experience working with JIRA, Confluence, Git, Bamboo
Have deep understanding in testing types and processes
Have good communicative skills and have a desire to help colleagues to improve their skills in automation area
Nice to have:
At least 1 year of BDD/Gherkin experience
Proven experience in rest API testing
Python knowledge will be great advantage
Experience testing Kafka events is a plus
Experience working on Agile teams, using Scrum methodologies
Keywords: Automation, Machine learning, Agile, Scrum, Selenium, JIRA, Monitoring, Testing, Python

Job Description:
Owning the quality of everything we put in front of our customer. We mean being the champion of quality no matter what it is that we deliver.
Working closely with our product, design and tech teams to deliver products with the goal of delighting and increasing the success of our customers, in a very iterative fashion.
Working closely with all stakeholders to understand what we are building. Architecting, designing our test strategy, plans and running them in the most efficient manner to deliver the product fast.
Creating an automation culture within the test team and automating at every opportunity to improve the speed and quality of testing. Work with engineers to improve integration testing.
Getting your hands dirty by getting into the details to the technicalities - analysing logs, understanding the databases and the structures, understanding the tools and frameworks and using all of them to debug and do better tests.
Contribute in improving test and engineering experience by evaluating, developing tools / frameworks / workflows / reporting dashboards etc.
What do I need?
5+ years of industry experience in a similar role, preferably in a SaaSproduct. You can demonstrate significant impact that your work has had on the product and/or the team.
Deep fundamental knowledge of testing principles, techniques, methods and tools.
Strong experience in running testing efforts on large scale customer facing products and API products.
Knowledge and experience in scripting, coding and automation tools.
Exceptional communication skills and upbeat character who can reach out to various stakeholders and get things done in remote setting.
Willingness to quickly learn and use new technologies or frameworks.
Extremely data-driven.
Work with and solve problems of very complex nature and enjoy doing it
Feel free to apply even if you feel unsure about whether you meet every single requirement in this posting. As long as youre a quick learner, and are excited about changing the status quo for tech recruitment, were happy to support you as you come up to speed with our tech stack.
Perks
Flexible vacation.
Flexible work times.
Work from anywhere.
Equipment you need to do your job
Health Insurance
Attractive ESOPs
Keywords: Selection process, Health insurance, Test strategy, Coding, SAAS, Integration testing, Automation tools, Product design, Recruitment, Testing

Job Title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET)
Job Description:
We are looking for a motivated and experienced Senior SDET Engineer who can join our Engineering team to develop and maintain automation frameworks for front end and backend applications.
This person will be responsible for designing, developing, implementing and supporting automation frameworks, test data and tools that are reliable, re-usable and maintainable.
This person will also work with PM, DevOps to improve processes and practices associated with CI & CD while continuously recommending, building, and updating tools and frameworks.
Required Skills:
6 or more years of experience in designing and developing necessary frameworks for testing API s, Java and React based applications both front-end and backend.
6 or more years of hands-on experience delivering test automation leveraging Agile process and CI/CD frameworks.
Develop and execute test strategies, improve automation, test data creation and tools to be used across teams for scalability testing.
Experience in white box testing writing unit tests using junit and java script.
Good Unix/Linux/Windows system administration and network troubleshooting skills.
Good understanding of protocols/technologies like HTTP, SSL, LDAP, JDBC, HTML, XML, JSON, REST, Application clustering / load balancing concepts and technologies
Develop code with re-usable components and operational strategies in the cloud & virtual environments (Vm s, Docker containers etc) to support scalability, high availability, performance, monitoring, backup, restore, etc.
Preferred Skills:
Experience developing automated tests using React based libraries like cypress.
Experience developing web applications is a plus.
Experience working with NoSQL DB is a plus.
What we offer in return is the opportunity to join a talented team of bright and nice people and to also enjoy
30 days of earned leaves plus an extra day off for your birthday, various other leaves like Marriage leave, Casual leave, Maternity leave , Paternity Leave
Premium Group medical Insurance for employee and 5 dependents ,Personal accident insurance coverage, Life insurance coverage
A modern office with a well-equipped gym onsite, free access to Yoga , Zumba classes by professional trainers
Professional development reimbursement
Interest subsidy on loans - either vehicle or personal loans
Keywords: Unix, Automation, Linux, LDAP, XML, Agile, JDBC, HTML, HTTP, JSON

Job Description:
We are looking for Software Test Engineers who have completed testing course and have sound knowledge of web and mobile application functionality, strong knowledge of functional testing, performance testing and quality testing. Good knowledge in both Manual Testing and Automation Testing must have good logical thinking to write test scenarios and test cases strong knowledge on Selenium, Microsoft SQL is a must. Maintain automation framework and test scripts, Execute automated test scripts to ensure that products and services meet standard end-user requirements. Fresher s willing to make a career into Software Testing can apply.
Responsibilities:
Designing test plans, scenarios, scripts, and procedures.
Executing tests on source code.
Analyzing test results and reporting to the development team.
Working with the development team to correct bugs and errors.
Document and communicate automated test results and resolution of open issues Conduct automated testing using various: servers, operating systems, browsers, and older versions of existing applications
Able to collaborate with QA, Business Analysts, and development teams to develop test scripts and test solutions
Interact with developer teams and product owners to offer suggestions and ideas to improve the quality of product
Analyze testing results to enhance future test scenarios and test scripts
Keywords: automation framework, Manual testing, Test scripts, Functional testing, Performance testing, Test scenarios, E-commerce, Selenium, Test cases, Testing

Job Description:
The candidate will be responsible for testing of functionality and interoperability of different features of a feature rich networking device and in designing and automation of test cases.
The candidate must have experience in testing one or more of the following technologies: IP Unicast and Multicast Routing protocols, IPv6, WAN protocols and Technologies, Layer 2 protocols and technologies , NAT/ Firewall, MEF Testing, QOS and/ or SNMP.

Job Description:
This position is responsible for providing software testing and validation services. The ideal candidate will be able to perform functional, regression and automation-testing using tools creatively to identify problems in software functionality. Responsibilities include conducting QA testing on enterprise grade software, providing expertise on troubleshooting errors, create/execute test plans, develop high coverage test cases, manage and organize test sets, provide detailed technical analysis, and advocate good software engineering practices.
Primary Responsibilities
Manage testing schedule and communicate testing progress.
Design, develop, and execute test cases using test plans and functional specifications.
Identify test requirements from specifications, map test case requirements and design test coverage plan.
Develop, document and maintain functional test cases and other test artifacts like the test data and data validation.
Isolate, replicate, and report defects and verify defect fixes.
Responsible for writing test scripts using selenium creating framework from scratch.
Generating reports of the test cycle.
Required Skills :
Experience
Knowledge of Manual or Automation.
Design, develop, and execute test cases using test plans and functional specifications.
Knowledge of writing automation test scripts using Selenium.
Candidate must be an individual player with minimum supervision
Keywords: C++, Core Java, Linux, XML, MySQL, Javascript, PHP, Oracle, SEO, Android

Job Description:

Job Description:
We are looking for a meticulous and experienced Senior Software Tester to lead the testing efforts. As a Senior Software Tester, you will be responsible for designing and executing comprehensive test plans, ensuring the quality and reliability of our software, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve issues. The ideal candidate has a strong understanding of software testing methodologies, excellent analytical skills, and a passion for delivering flawless user experiences.
  Responsibility:
Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts to thoroughly test the functionality, performance, and reliability.
Identify, analyze, and document software defects and anomalies, working closely with the development team to investigate root causes and propose effective solutions.
Collaborate with the product management team to review and analyze functional requirements, ensuring testability and alignment with user expectations.
Design and maintain test data sets to simulate real-world scenarios and ensure comprehensive test coverage.
Conduct manual and automated testing, including functional, regression, performance, and security testing.
Develop and maintain test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test reports, to ensure traceability and knowledge sharing.
Implement and enhance testing frameworks, tools, and methodologies to improve testing efficiency and effectiveness.
Collaborate with developers and stakeholders to ensure a clear understanding of software requirements, features, and quality objectives.
Lead and mentor junior testers, providing guidance, training, and support in test design, execution, and best practices.
Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and advancements in software testing, and proactively apply this knowledge to improve testing processes and methodologies.
Requirements:
Bachelors degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Software Tester or Senior Software Tester, preferably in a SaaS environment.
Strong understanding of software testing methodologies, tools, and best practices.
Experience with manual and automated testing techniques and tools (e.g., Selenium, JUnit, TestNG).
Solid understanding of test management tools (e.g., Jira, TestRail) and version control systems (e.g., Git).
Proficiency in creating and executing SQL queries for database testing.
Experience with performance testing tools (e.g., JMeter) is a plus.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with keen attention to detail.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team-oriented environment.
Self-motivated with the ability to work independently and prioritize tasks effectively.
Knowledge of the real estate industry or property management software is highly desirable.
Keywords: Product management, Computer science, Version control, Test scripts, Testing tools, Performance testing, Security testing, Selenium, Test cases, JIRA

Self-motivated and a good team player.
Good communication and Interpersonal skills.
Preferred years of experience - 2 year.
Knowledge of testing using automated tool is desired.
Block box testing / White box testing
Functional testing

Good organizational skills and detail-oriented mindset.
BSc in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent.

Job Title: Sr. Analyst Software Testing || British Council || C2H Hybrid
Job Description:
Hiring Immediate joiners on contract to hire


End Client: British Council
Payroll partner: Altezzasys Systems

The Test automation lead Engineer role at British Council is fundamental to helping with our QA approach within the organisation. The Test Lead Engineer will work within an agile scrum-based delivery team as the champion of quality. As a Test Lead Engineer, you will work with others in the QA team to lead the drive improvement of processes and tools; along with assisting the development and up-skilling of fellow testing team members. This is an exciting opportunity for someone who is interested lead the Automation testing in moving Quality forward.
Possess a complete understanding the Testing methodology, processes and associated testing tools and standards.
Have a full understanding of all Projects in the release.
Participating in Sprint Planning and driving the quality aspect for every change.

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced and dynamic Software Testing Trainer ( Manual & Automation Testing Both ) to join our esteemed IT Training Institute. As a Software Testing Trainer, you will play a crucial role in imparting practical knowledge and industry insights to aspiring software testing professionals. Your expertise and guidance will contribute to the development of skilled and competent individuals who are ready to excel in the field of software testing.

Responsibilities:

Design and deliver comprehensive software testing training modules to equip participants with a deep understanding of testing methodologies, techniques, and tools.
Develop engaging and interactive training materials, including presentations, hands-on exercises, and real-world case studies.
Conduct training sessions that foster active participation, knowledge retention, and skill enhancement.
Demonstrate proficiency in both manual and automated testing practices, ensuring participants are well-versed in various testing approaches.
Provide guidance on creating effective test plans, test cases, and defect management processes.
Address participants' questions, challenges, and concerns, fostering an inclusive and collaborative learning environment.
Collaborate with the curriculum development team to continuously enhance and update training materials to reflect current industry standards.


Requirements:

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Proven professional experience in software testing, including manual and automated testing techniques.
Recognized industry certifications such as ISTQB, CSTE, or equivalent are highly desirable.
Strong presentation and communication skills, with the ability to explain complex concepts in a clear and understandable manner.
Prior experience in teaching or training, particularly in an IT or software development context.
Proficiency in using testing tools and frameworks, such as Selenium, JUnit, TestNG, etc.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to address diverse learning needs within a classroom setting.
Passion for continuous learning and staying current with industry trends and developments.
Patience, empathy, and a genuine interest in helping participants succeed in their software testing careers.


This is a challenging and rewarding opportunity to make a significant impact on the careers of aspiring software testing professionals. If you are a seasoned software testing expert with a passion for teaching and mentoring, we invite you to join our team and contribute to shaping the future of software testing excellence.

NOTE : AUTOMATION TESTING IS MUST FOR THIS VACANCY.


*Please note that this position is open only to experienced professionals; freshers will not be considered for this role.*
Keywords: software testing, Manual Testing, Automation Testing, testing approaches, Software Testing Life Cycle, test cases, teaching, Bug Reporting, ISTQB, Smoke Testing, QA Testing, QA Analysis, Mobile Testing, testing methodologies, Test Scenarios, Corporate Training, it training, STLC

Job Description:
The Software Engineer in Test-II I (SDET) k eeps a keen eye on customer commitments and work collaboratively with engineering counterparts to meet customer commitments. The position must build productive working relationships and collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet customer quality specifications. The position is responsible for the design, implementation, and documentation of code automation. Works on problem analysis and exercises judgment based on situations and data. Productive relationships with senior internal and external contacts in their own area of expertise. Leads the activities to closure independently and takes the necessary help/steps to complete.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities :
Validates multiple software products using systematic tests to develop, apply, and maintain quality standards for company products while working in an agile team
Develops, modifies, and executes complete test plans based on design specifications
Observes and records defects in software products using systematic tests to apply and maintain quality standards for company products
Works closely with development teams to improve product quality and development methodologies related to quality engineering
Uses product knowledge and insight to design and execute exploratory testing
Applies knowledge and application of best practices in the achievement of QA goals
Can communicate within a team environment, consulting with development engineers in resolution of complex problems
Ensures quality integration into all aspects of software development, data acquisition, and processin g
Automates and improves existing tests and converts new tests to automated suites
Creates complete test plans based on design specifications and strategies
Updates and creates test cases to support correction of customer reported issues
Participates with the development team in feature and test design during team-based development meetings
Identifies test case candidates for automation. Designs and develops automated test case
Execute existing test cases; conduct Test Case reviews Maintains documentation and reports status of test results , i ndependently develop test plans for relatively complex features
Has the ability to prove coverage analysis and proactively adjust testing to improve test coverage
Observes and records defects in software products through the use of systematic tests to apply and maintain quality standards for company products
Ability to communicate within a team environment, working with development engineers in resolution of a simple problem
Mentors others; mentors junior SDETs
Recommend processes and procedures for continual improvement
Technical Skills - Rexx, JCL, DB2 , ISPF , Batch scheduling, VSAM, Mainframe Automation, SMP/E
Required Qualifications:
5 + years of experience working on software quality
Experience in Design using good Object-Oriented programming practices and Design Patterns
Has an advanced understanding of QA methodologies.
Min 2-3 years of work experience in manual and automated software testing.
Demonstrated competence in automation using scripting or other languages
Experience with problem tracking systems and test case management systems
Preferred Qualifications:
Quality certifications like ASQ a plus
Education:
Bachelor s degree in Computer Science, IS Engineering, or related technical discipline; advance degree preferred
Keywords: Automation, Quality standards, Db2, Consulting, Customer quality, Scheduling, Test cases, Software quality assurance, Scripting, Testing

Job Description:
In this role, you will be responsible for functional, performance, and integration testing by creating automated test cases to ensure the world-class quality of Avalara products

You will be working closely with product and developer teams on a day-to-day basis

Engage in continuous automated and manual testing activity throughout agile development iterations to ensure zero defects.

Excellent designing and programming skills.

Job Description:
Arista Networks is seeking high-caliber self-motivated test engineers for its enterprise and cloud-managed WiFi products.
As a test engineer, you serve as the first customer of our products.
You will ensure that the bugs that escape autonomous testing, implemented by the development team, are caught before the product is made available to our customers.
This means that you will:
Focus your testing efforts on those hard-to-find bugs in the product that the autonomous testing framework could not or cannot cover; and
Challenge your imagination and skills to come up with creative ways to break the product in real customer scenarios instead of wasting time on manual regression testing of basic functionality.
Able to work successfully in a fast-paced environment, including with multiple platforms and architectures, diverse technologies, and cloud environments.
Bachelor s degree in E&TC/EE/CE/CS/IT or a related field; Master s degree a plus.
2 - 8 years of experience in testing & troubleshooting Cloud technologies, virtualization, Microservices and debugging complex software; experience with wired or wireless networks a plus.
Good experience in working with Hadoop & Big data technologies like HDFS, HBase, Spark, Kafka streaming and Elasticsearch
Good working knowledge of Database (SQL) and Server side validations.
Experience with types of performance testing (Load test, Stress test and capacity test) will be a plus.
Strong understanding of distributed systems fundamentals around scalability, elasticity, availability, fault-tolerance.
Strong analytical and debugging skills, and proven expertise in creating test methodologies and writing test plans.
Solid knowledge of networking fundamentals across the OSI stack is a must.
Strong knowledge with Linux systems and networking tools.
Basic knowledge of AWS, GCP and Kubernetes
Basic knowledge of RESTful APIs, JSON, and SQL.
Familiarity with scripting languages such as Python will be a plus.
Excellent written and oral English communication skills.
Responsibilities
Understand the Arista WiFi cloud architecture, its components, and related products.
Work with software development, test engineers and field support engineers to gather technical requirements, participate in functional specification and software design reviews, and validate that the product meets our customers requirements.
Write test plans, including the design of test network topologies and methodologies, to verify the product features you will test.
Own the feature and product, and be the single point of contact and testing expert for your deliverables.
Execute the test plan and report bugs found during the testing. Your bug reports should include a detailed description of the conditions under which a bug manifests and how it can be reproduced, the resulting product behavior, and the extent of its impact on our customers. Logs and traces, wherever relevant, are mandatory to be provided.
Identify opportunities and develop tools to automate testing procedures that can make the software testing team more efficient and productive.

Job Description:
Our Engineering team is built on a solid foundation of lean methodology and continuous improvements. To help us continue to grow our offerings, we are looking for experienced Mobile Automation Engineers, who will work with the engineering team to deliver a range of products. We are looking for highly skilled problem solvers, with a strong background in cross-platform and full-stack development stacks. Your goal is to build robust and scalable products that perform beyond expectations for both internal and external customers.

You are expected to work with the Product, Design teams and other Stakeholders to design and build internal tools, platform technologies, and deep integrations with 3rd party services. Additionally, you will be leading and collaborating with cross-functional teams while leveraging industry, customer, and competitive research, along with data analytics to deliver customer value and to achieve strategic goals and objectives.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for testing and debugging responsive web and mobile applications for the company.
Responsibilities
As a Software Development Engineer in Test, you will help take on a variety of technical challenges.
You will play an active role in building the mobile automation framework that other testers will rely on every single day.
Youll also work in product code to exact integration tests.
As a member of our QE group, which brings new experiences, you will most definitely help shape our released products.
You should be comfortable with a degree of ambiguity and able to work autonomously.
You should also be excited by technology, passionate about learning, and should view every customer interaction as a chance to create a beautiful customer experience.
Everyone on our team needs to be creative, wear many hats and work in a highly collaborative environment thats more startup than big company.
We need a Mobile Quality Engineer / SDET who can solve problems through a consultative approach and contribute to continuous product and process improvement. The candidate should be adaptive to a continuously changing and fast-paced environment, be able to successfully multi-task and thrive in a dynamic, fully engaged QA role.


Good to have
We need a Mobile Quality Engineer / SDET who can solve problems through a consultative approach and contribute to continuous product and process improvement. The candidate should be adaptive to a continuously changing and fast-paced environment, be able to successfully multi-task and thrive in a dynamic, fully engaged QA role.
We hope you have a Bachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering or a related field.
2+ years of experience as an SDET, developer, or strong Automation Engineer.
Proven experience creating automation frameworks on web and mobile and tools to support test automation.
Knowledge of mobile technologies preferred.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, delivery-oriented environment.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, and draw valid conclusions Efficient note-taking, documenting, and typing skills are required.
Be able to independently research issues using existing documentation (specifications and user manual).
Proven interpersonal, analytical, attention to detail/strategy, and creative problem-solving skills.
The ability to work on multiple projects and set priorities.
Excellent written and oral communication skills.
Highly self-motivated and directed. Strong customer orientation.
Experience working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment.

Must Have
Strong understanding about mobile testing.
Automation framework development for mobile.
Good To Have
API and web automation.
Performance testing
Keywords: automation framework, SAN, Automation, SOC, Debugging, Performance testing, Product design, Mobile testing

Job Title: Software Engineer in Test - Lead - Applied AI Consulting
Job Description:
We are seeking a Software Engineer in Test (SET) Lead to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating test strategies and plans, designing and executing test cases, and developing automated test scripts. The SET Lead will be responsible for ensuring that our products meet quality standards and that our testing processes are efficient and effective.
The primary objective of the MIS division is to ensure that the organization's information needs are met effectively and efficiently. This involves coordinating with various departments and stakeholders to identify their requirements and develop systems that align with the organization's strategic goals. The MIS division plays a crucial role in integrating technology with business processes, enabling seamless flow of information and promoting data-driven decision-making. This unit serves as the bridge between technology and business within an organization. Its primary focus is on utilizing technology to optimize information management, support decision-making, and enhance overall organizational performance. By aligning technology with business objectives and ensuring the availability, integrity, and security of information, the MIS division plays a critical role in enabling the organization to adapt to evolving market dynamics and achieve its strategic goals.

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented candidate with several years of experience in software Quality Assurance to join our QA team. This position will be at an individual contributor level as part of a collaborative, fast-paced team. As a member of the QA team, you will work closely with Product Managers and Developers to understand application features and create robust comprehensive test plans, write test cases, and work closely with the developers to make the applications more testable.
We are looking for a well-rounded candidate with solid analytical skills, an enthusiasm for taking ownership of features, a strong commitment to quality, and the ability to work closely and communicate effectively with development and other teams. Experience with the following is preferred:
Python
Perl
Shell Scripting

MySQL
CI/CD

Strong understanding of testing methodologies
Scripting
Strong problem analysis and troubleshooting skills
Experience in databases, preferably MySQL
Debugging skills
REST/API testing experience is a plus
Integrate end-to-end tests with CI/CD pipelines and monitor and improve metrics around test coverage
Ability to work in a dynamic and agile development environment and be adaptable to changing requirements
Performance testing experience with relevant automation and monitoring tools
Exposure to Dockerization or Virtualization is a plus
Experience working in the Linux/Unix environment
Basic understanding of OS

Experience working in the Linux/Unix environment

Keywords: Unix, Automation, Linux, MySQL, Shell scripting, Performance testing, Perl, Selenium, Troubleshooting, Python

Job Description:
We are recruiting a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) to work as part of the software development team in Hitachi Vantara Engineering, who are responsible for designing, developing and testing the Hitachi NAS Platform product
As part of an agile team you will understand the deliverables and pro-actively take part in the team s self-organisation to ensure sprint goals are met.
You will play a key role in shaping the design, testing and integration of prioritised work.
This will involve tackling problems of diverse scope, designing and implementing tests to ensure the quality of the product.
An ideal candidate will understand the Scrum framework for software development and will be willing to work as part of a team to achieve common sprint goals.
Duties are likely to involve software design, coding, hands-on adhoc and exploratory testing, and automated test development work.
You will also help to define test strategies and promote test coverage and test automation helping us move towards shorter integration and deployment cycles.
A successful candidate must have a proven record of accomplishments in automated test development.
What you bring to the team
Responsibilities:
Design and implement automated tests in collaboration with the agile development team.
Create and execute ad-hoc and exploratory tests to ensure the quality of the product
Build and support automated testing infrastructure
Test and develop software across the stack (embedded C++, APIs, management applications and user interfaces).
Maintain existing tests, and eventually be involved in diagnosing and resolving escalated problems.
Work as a part of an agile scrum team to deliver team commitments and achieve continual improvements.
Produce and maintain high quality documentation
Ensure good, automated regression test coverage
Qualifications:
Computer Science degree or equivalent industry experience. At least 8 years in quality engineering or development
Programming experience in Python, C++ and/or Java
Proficient sysadmin skills across all major OS (Linux and Windows is a must), storage systems, hypervisors, and containers
Aptitude - self-starter, love of learning, inquisitive mind, openness to new ideas
Excellent attention to detail, and adaptability to change
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Driven, self-motivated, with a strong work ethic; an individual who has a passion for problem solving and improving engineering deliverables.
Experience with any of the following technologies would be an advantage:
o Network Attached Storage (NAS)
o Storage systems
o Networking
o Unix/Windows client/server environments
o Virtualization
o File serving protocols e.g. NFS or SMB Experience with (or strong knowledge of) automation infrastructure would be beneficial
e.g. Jenkins, Salt, Docker, etc.
Scrum master experience or certification is a plus
Keywords: Unix, C++, Automation, Linux, Coding, Healthcare, Scrum, Windows, Virtualization, Python

Job Description:
1. Test Planning and Design:
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and specifications.
- Develop comprehensive test plans, test cases, and test scripts based on project documentation.
- Review and validate requirements for testability and clarity.
2. Test Execution and Reporting:
- Execute functional, regression, integration, and user acceptance tests.
- Identify and document defects using a defined defect tracking system.
- Provide clear and concise defect reports, including steps to reproduce and detailed observations.
- Collaborate closely with developers to ensure defects are resolved and verified.
3. Test Documentation:
- Create and maintain detailed test documentation, including test cases, test scripts, and testing results.
- Document testing processes and methodologies for future reference.
4. Quality Metrics and Reporting:
- Track and report on testing progress, including test execution status and defect metrics.
- Provide status updates to project stakeholders and team leads.
5. Test Environment Management:
- Set up and configure test environments to accurately simulate production conditions.
- Collaborate with IT and development teams to ensure a stable and consistent testing environment.
6. Collaboration and Communication:
- Participate in requirements review meetings to contribute QA insights.
- Collaborate with development, product, and design teams to address quality concerns and provide testing input.
- Work closely with other QA team members to share knowledge and best practices.
Requirements:
- Bachelor s degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.
- Proven experience as a Manual QA Engineer with 3 to 5 years of experience.
- Strong understanding of software testing methodologies and best practices.
- Proficiency in creating test plans, test cases, and test scripts.
- Experience in identifying , documenting, and tracking defects.
- Familiarity with software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.
- Excellent attention to detail and analytical skills.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate within a team.
- Familiarity with tools such as JIRA, TestRail, or similar QA management tools.
Keywords: Manual testing, Test scripts, Defect tracking, Test execution, Intellectual property, Agile, Test cases, JIRA, SDLC

Job Description:
We are looking for a Java developer responsible for building Java applications. This includes anything between complex groups of back-end services and their client-end (desktop and mobile) counterparts. Your primary responsibility will be to design and develop these applications, and to coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Thus, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and product quality is essential.
Responsibilities
We are looking for an experienced QA Test Automation Engineer to be part of our team. Your understanding of functional testing, writing maintainable tests, written and verbal communication skills will be put to the test.
- We prefer someone with 2 to 4 years of experience in automation testing. You must have experience of working with testing frameworks like selenium, or SaaS products for functional testing like cypress.io.
- Well versed with a bug tracking tool, fiddler, test flight, emulators, postman and SQL queries.
- Dedicated to testing. While testing can sometimes get repetitive and monotonous, it is critical to our engineering efforts, someone who can drive the complete engineering process.
- Strong problem-solving skills, technical and analytical aptitude with the ability to quickly learn and adopt technical products.
- Ability to understand a software product and its nuances very well.
- Previous B2B SaaS and enterprise software experience.
Keywords: Product quality, SQL queries, Automation testing, Functional testing, Analytical, SAAS, Selenium, Emulators, Enterprise software, Testing

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled Test Automation Engineer with experience in automated testing, Selenium testing, and JMeter testing. As a Test Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing automated test scripts, identifying and analyzing software defects, and collaborating with software developers to address and resolve issues.
Responsibilities:
Develop and implement automated test scripts using tools such as Selenium and JMeter
Identify, analyze, and report software defects to the development team
Collaborate with software developers to troubleshoot and resolve defects
Participate in the design and implementation of test strategies and plans
Develop and maintain automated testing frameworks and tools
Continuously evaluate and improve test automation strategies and processes
Create and maintain test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test scripts
Participate in Agile/Scrum development process, including sprint planning, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups
Requirements:
Bachelors degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, or related field
2+ years of experience in test automation
Strong experience with automated testing tools such as Selenium and JMeter
Experience with software testing methodologies and test planning
Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C#
Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development processes
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
Strong written and verbal communication skills
If you meet the above requirements and are passionate about test automation, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
Keywords: Software testing, Automation testing, Test scripts, Agile scrum, Testing tools, Programming, Selenium, Test cases, Python

Job Description:
** Important Information **
This position is not for Freshers / Inexperienced persons.
Prior Experience in Software Testing / QA and/ or Software Support is mandatory.
Immediate Joiners would be preferred
There would be No Work from Home (WFH) option for this position.



The Organisation

Inspira Software Services Pvt. Ltd., an established software product and services company, specialising in development of Enterprise Business Process Automation software products.The company has been helping top notch companies automate their business processes over three decades.Online business process automation software of the company, e.g. top of the line Service CRM, ERP, Project Management software etc. run on Cloud servers, are designed for 24x7 operations for enterprise customers and are offered under the SaaS (Software as a Service) model. The PositionWe are inviting applications for the role of Senior Software Test Engineer for our Enterprise software products, spanning domains like CRM, ERP, and Project Management.

N O T E

The position involves providing software testing services for a Japanese MNC customer organisation headquartered in Gurugram / Gurgaon, Delhi NCR.

The incumbent would be responsible for providing proactive software testing support to the users of the company's Service CRM software product Inspira CRM - Service which is being used for managing countrywide field service operations for premium consumer durable equipment.

___________________________________________________________


Job Description


As a Senior Software Test Engineer at Inspira Software Services Pvt. Ltd., you will:

Immerse yourself in a comprehensive understanding of our enterprise business process automation software products, including CRM, ERP, Project Management, and related Mobile Applications.

Devise test plans, scenarios, scripts, and procedures for new software modules, including the following types of testing:

Functional Testing: Verify that the software functions as intended, with a focus on specific features and user interactions.

Regression Testing: Ensure the stability of software releases by testing changes against existing functionality.

User Acceptance Testing (UAT): Collaborate with end-users to validate software functionality and ensure it meets business requirements.

Performance Testing: Assess system performance under various conditions to ensure it meets performance criteria.

Security Testing: Identify vulnerabilities and ensure the software is secure against potential threats.

Load Testing: Evaluate system performance under varying load conditions.

Integration Testing: Verify that individual software modules work together seamlessly.

Usability Testing: Evaluate the software's user-friendliness and user experience.

Mobile App Testing: Test mobile applications for compatibility, functionality, and performance.

Execute tests in accordance with the test plans.
Analyze test results and provide detailed reports to the development team.
Collaborate closely with the development team to rectify bugs and resolve errors.
Create, execute, and document test cases, logging defects and sharing recommendations with the project team.
Actively support end users during the user acceptance testing (UAT) phase, ensuring a smooth transition for newly developed software or software modules.
Track and manage reported software issues in cooperation with the product engineering team.
Play a crucial role in translating business requirements into technical specifications, system acceptance criteria, and functional test plans, with a focus on coverage, performance, and automation.
Assist customer organisations in migrating legacy data during implementation of enterprise software products.
Maintain a record of customer-reported issues and their resolutions in the CRM software.
Conduct customer satisfaction surveys, gathering feedback from software end users.
Contribute to software product improvement by providing feedback to the product engineering team.


Desired Applicant Profile:

Educational qualification: Graduate degree in Science/Technology or Diploma in Software Development/IT.


Key Skills -

Prior experience in enterprise software quality assurance, software testing, and support.

Knowledge of automated testing is preferred, though not mandatory.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

Proficiency in testing processes, tools, and methodologies.

Familiarity with RDBMS and SQL, including the ability to write SQL queries for testing software.

Exceptional troubleshooting skills with a talent for root cause analysis.

Quick grasp of software product functionalities.

Independence, ownership, a pleasant personality, and patience.

Effective spoken and written English communication skills.

Active listening skills.

A customer-centric attitude and the desire to assist users in effectively using our software products.

Proficiency in MS Office software, particularly MS Excel.

Willingness to travel to other cities for official assignments when necessary.



Salary -

Salary is negotiable and would be commensurate with Industry Experience / Qualification and would not be a constraint for deserving professionals.

In addition to fixed monthly salary, periodic performance linked incentives would be offered.


Contact Details:

Phone / WhatsApp: 7 5 9 6 8 0 0 2 9 1
Keywords: Software Testing, Software Implementation, Software Support, Software Requirement Specification, Communication Skills, Presentation Skills, Project Coordination

Job Description:
To ensure the delivery of high performance code, OPTEL is looking to add to its team a senior Software Development Engineer in Test that will help design the testing strategy, implement test scripts and test framework for our products. The SDET will act as a catalyst and an enabler for the development team.
Key Responsibilities :
Create, build and set up a system with manual and automated testing frameworks for complex scenarios
Maintain and improve test frameworks and automation scripts in collaboration with developers
Act as a reference for the development team regarding software testing strategy and best practices (coverage, automation, integration, security, etc)
Ensure the proper functioning of the test pipeline of the solution and resolve any issues
Assist the development team with the investigation of automated test failures with respect of SOC2 policies
Identifies performance opportunities and optimizes stability issues (monitoring, maintenance, reporting, etc)
Propose new tools and working methods to continuously improve
Requirements
University degree or relevant studies with significant experience in manual and automated testing
Ability to select the best tools and libraries according to use cases such as but not limited to: Selenium, Protractor, NUnit, Nightwatch, WireMock, React Testing Library and Mountebank.
Knowledge of common programming languages in particular Javascript / C # / Python;
Experience in contract testing between microservices (ex. Pact.io)
Experience in integrating test automation with CI/CD pipeline (Gitlab an asset);
Experience with identifying and troubleshooting errors and bugs within product teams
Up to date with emerging technologies and willing to learn.
Nice to have:
Knowledge of Business Intelligence, Analytics and ETL is a plus;
Knowledge of application hosting and deployment in the cloud (Azure, GCP or AWS);
Knowledge of PostgreSQL or other relational database and SQL;
Comfortable with technologies such as: TerraForm, Gitlab, Pulumi, Ansible, Docker, Kubernetes, etc;
Knowledge of Typescript and React
Manage consent
Keywords: SQA, Postgresql, Software Development Manager, Javascript, Selenium, Business intelligence, Troubleshooting, Analytics, SQL, Python

3. Write a Python script to call a java application

Job Description:
An innovative, team-oriented Software Test Engineer
The ideal candidate will have Mobile applications testing experience, web applications testing experience, and experience with industry standard QA tools
This Software Test Engineer should have experience in automating tests
The Software Test Engineer will interact with other stakeholders as needed, but many activities will require independent thought and decision making
Key Responsibilities & Accountabilities
Analyses and understands requirements, devises a test strategy to adequately cover the requirements, develops high-level test scenarios that implement the strategy, elaborates scenarios into detailed test cases.
Reviews test artefacts with Business and Development team members and edits accordingly.
Owns the QA role throughout all projects by: gathering requirements, writing and executing tests (manual and automatic), monitoring test progress, reporting status, logging defects, tracking and testing defect fixes, retesting and delivering.
Works with user and partner teams to develop automated test scripts and extend the automation infrastructure.
Collaborates with the business and development teams to produce requirements that are well-documented and clear.
Maintains subject matter expertise for the systems under test and use that expertise to create, maintain and extend the test case library
Participates in team process improvement to make sure everyone understands development lifecycle.
Experience in Firebase for events and app monitoring

Education & Experience:
Bachelor's degree in computer science/Engineering or related field, or equivalent professional experience
4+ years of software testing and QA experience
Extensive experience in functional test plan and design, functional and non-functional requirements review, and black box test case creation and execution.
Strong experience with exploratory testing and system regression testing

Job Description:
To ensure the delivery of high performance code, OPTEL is looking to add to its team a senior Software Development Engineer in Test that will help design the testing strategy, implement test scripts and test framework for our products
The SDET will act as a catalyst and an enabler for the development team
Key Responsibilities :
Create, build and set up a system with manual and automated testing frameworks for complex scenarios
Maintain and improve test frameworks and automation scripts in collaboration with developers
Act as a reference for the development team regarding software testing strategy and best practices (coverage, automation, integration, security, etc)
Ensure the proper functioning of the test pipeline of the solution and resolve any issues
Assist the development team with the investigation of automated test failures with respect of SOC2 policies
Identifies performance opportunities and optimizes stability issues (monitoring, maintenance, reporting, etc)
Propose new tools and working methods to continuously improve
Requirements
University degree or relevant studies with significant experience in manual and automated testing
Ability to select the best tools and libraries according to use cases such as but not limited to: Selenium, Protractor, NUnit, Nightwatch, WireMock, React Testing Library and Mountebank.
Knowledge of common programming languages in particular Javascript / C # / Python;
Experience in contract testing between microservices (ex. Pact.io)
Experience in integrating test automation with CI/CD pipeline (Gitlab an asset);
Experience with identifying and troubleshooting errors and bugs within product teams
Up to date with emerging technologies and willing to learn.
Nice to have:
Knowledge of Business Intelligence, Analytics and ETL is a plus;
Knowledge of application hosting and deployment in the cloud (Azure, GCP or AWS);
Knowledge of PostgreSQL or other relational database and SQL;
Comfortable with technologies such as: TerraForm, Gitlab, Pulumi, Ansible, Docker, Kubernetes, etc;
Knowledge of Typescript and React
Manage consent
Keywords: SQA, Postgresql, Software Development Manager, Javascript, Selenium, Business intelligence, Troubleshooting, Analytics, SQL, Python

Job Description:
As a Software Test Engineer at Sago, you will work with our team of experienced professionals in developing and executing automated tests to ensure the quality of our software solutions
You will be responsible for performing rigorous testing on our applications, creating test cases, writing test scripts, and identifying defects

Work closely with the development team to ensure all testing is completed on time and to a high standard

Collaborate with project managers, developers, and stakeholders to ensure the delivery of high-quality software products
Use a variety of testing tools and methodologies, including Selenium, to accurately identify and track software defects
Continuously improve the quality of our software solutions by providing input and feedback to the development team


Proven experience working as a software test engineer, with Selenium
Strong knowledge of automation testing frameworks and tools

Zyxware Technologies is looking for a Senior Software Test Engineer who can lead our team of talented software testers towards delivering true value to our clients. The Senior Test Engineer is accountable for achieving client satisfaction and ensuring the overall quality of the testing phase. We expect the Senior Test Engineer to have the ability to identify and work with metrics to ensure that the testing process satisfies the organisational and project requirements. The Senior Test Engineer should be able to plan, schedule testing tasks , to analyse, evaluate & ensure the quality of testing and lead, mentor the testing team to focus on quality deliverables.
Selected candidates will be placed at our office in Technopark, Thiruvananthapuram or at Kochi. Outstation candidates can avail work from home option on a permanent basis.

Lead the team to perform end to end application testing right from requirement analysis to system study, test design, test execution and documentation and ensure on time and on schedule testing delivery.
Closely work with the Business Analysis Team & client to understand and analyse requirements and give valid suggestions based on domain experience.

Analyse the test reports and ensure regularity on reporting the same to stakeholders.
Effectively prioritize, manage, track, and report project status.

Ensure a standard level of NFR testing such as SEO, Security, Accessibility & Performance is done for all the projects.

Identifying risks & issues and finding out mitigation and contingency plans along with the development team.
Reviewing & updating test artifacts, Collecting test metrics.

Experience in back end and front end integration testing.
Experience on different content types, Validating Content addition workflow & Content publishing workflow Knowledge in Configuration settings.
Knowledge in tools such as Invision, Zeplin, Postman etc.
Experience in responsive testing, Cross Browser Testing, mobile app testing.
Experience in SEO, Security, Accessibility & Performance.
Experience in building automation framework, writing, executing & reviewing test scripts, conducting automation feasibility analysis & come up with automation plan and schedule and verify Testing Reports.
Team Management skills:
Qualification:
B Tech Computer Science/MCA
2+ years of experience in leading a team

Job Description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Software Test Engineer to join Aissel as a member of the integrated product development and Software Testing team at our Hubli Office.
Responsibilities
The Software Test Engineer will be responsible for providing input to product release plans that cover project inception through delivery and on-going operational maintenance. The profile includes analyzing and solve complex testing-related problems; review other developers and tester s work products for correctness, adherence to the product design concept and user standards.

Analyzing complex requirements and design documents to develop detailed step by step manual test cases
Executing manual documenting actual results during execution; reviewing the test results and reporting anomalies (if any) into the defect tracking database
Executing Load/Performance testing by running the load test scripts and generating the load test execution results reports
Tracking the defects from creation to closure; documenting detail description of defect and working with developers to reproduce
Deploying software to test environments and monitoring server logs during testing and identify errors and/or unexpected log entries
Participating and/or facilitating the test case peer review meetings and providing feedback, making sure that developed test cases meet the requirements and test conditions verifies the requested functionality
Assisting test lead with release test plan, maintaining regression test database, and creating test reports at the end of each testing phase
Assisting the test lead on performing an internal quality assurance check on all deliverables to ensure that all deliverables are complete, accurate, and adhere to the client s standards
Providing assistance to business analyst with business/functional requirements and developers with technical requirements
Essential Skills
Strong knowledge of Software Testing Life cycle/Testing Methodologies
Ability to analyze complex requirements and design documents to create detailed test cases and scripts especially in web and mobility solutions.
Expertise in executing test cases and documenting actual results, identifying software defects and creating test reports
Basic to intermediate knowledge of Structured Query Language, web tools like PHP, HTML etc.
Excellent oral and written communication skills
Ability to work productively in a dynamic, priority shifting, deadline-driven environment.
Excellent organizational, presentation and business analysis skills
Knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)
Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field
Knowledge of healthcare industry and processes is an added plus
Keywords: Manager Quality Assurance, Business analysis, Performance testing, PHP, Healthcare, Test planning, HTML, Business intelligence, SDLC, Monitoring

Job Title: Staff Software Development Engineer in Test
Company Name: Affairs Events and Exhibitions Accpre Exposition
Job Description:
Explore, evaluate, and recommend test automation frameworks for functional and non-functional testing.

Enable automated test executions within CI/CD pipelines.
Demonstrate a passion for building high-quality software, adhering to best practices in Data Structures, System Design Patterns, and OOPs concepts.
Support development teams in monitoring, maintaining, refactoring, and continuously improving existing automated tests.
Ensure that a scalable and robust test infrastructure is available for every development team, enabling them to perform automation independently.
Develop tools and processes for creating and managing test data.
Assist development teams in performing gap analysis in automation, and test coverage to continuously improve quality by identifying and reducing defects as early as possible in the development cycle.
Review reported bugs and incident postmortems - making recommendations on how to fortify test coverage.
Collaborate with development teams to set QA strategy for projects and features.
Focus on eliminating manual/regression test execution and improve test efficiency by creating automated solutions.Participate in special projects and perform other duties as assigned.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technologies related to test automation and software development.
THE SKILL SET:
8+ years of industry experience in software development with understanding of test automation frameworks designs.
Prior experience with open-source test automation frameworks and tools.
Demonstrated experience in building software from scratch and enhancing existing open-source tools.
Strong expertise in Data Structures, System Design Patterns, and OOPs concepts.
Proficiency in one or more programming languages (eg, Python, Java, JavaScript) for building scalable and maintainable software.
Understanding of Software Test Life Cycle.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with a keen eye for detail.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Experience with automated testing across the testing pyramid (unit, integration, end-to-end).
Experience CI/CD (Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment) practices and tools.
Experience with one or more tools mentioned below, but not limited to:
Static code analysis tools (SonarQube, CodeClimate,...)
API testing solutions (Pact, Karate,...)
UI/E2E testing solutions (Cypress, Playwright, WebdriverIO, or Selenium)
Logging and debugging tools (Cloudwatch, Sentry, Datadog,...)
Cloud infrastructure
You have a passion for delivering well tested and maintainable code.
You are a results-driven self-starter with great communication and collaboration skills.
You enjoy teaching and mentoring colleagues.
BONUS POINTS FOR:

Job Description:
A Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) is a developer with the primary responsibility of writing frameworks and tools to test products.
It is a very unique and challenging role and provides immense opportunity to design and develop wide-reaching tools. It combines the "building" aspect of software design engineering with the "breaking" aspect of software test engineering. You ll be writing code that automatically verifies the quality of the product. That means that you potentially write more code than the developers.
SDETs are able to understand software internals, debug code, automate repetitive tasks, and implement new tools and frameworks needed to streamline our quality process.
In the Loginradius SDETs works directly with both Software Development Engineers and Quality Assurance Engineers to understand project features, review technical designs, and implement automated test tools that help deliver quality features with efficiency.
Our SDETs understand customer usage models and are able to develop test plans and test cases that approximate realworld environments and scenarios.
Requirement summary
Min 6 months to 3 years of experience in automating Web application which is development driven.
Must be Expert in web automation framework: Selenium
Should possess Strong Programming Fundamentals.
Expert in Automating web applications using selenium with Java and Node JS.
Experience in API Test Automation.
Performed Automation Testing of Rest API using RestAssured Framework.
Tested REST APIs of application and automated using Selenium. Should be able to conduct code review, able to pinpoint logical issues in code under test, should be able to create test case scripts and their execution should be able to do Unit Level testing as per the need of the Project/ Product development.
Detail-oriented with strong analytical, communication, problem-solving, and organizational skills.
Developed, documented, and maintained detailed test cases, user scenarios, and test artifacts.
Should have worked in BDD environment as SDET. Requirement Summary
Engineering Degree in Computer Science or related fields.
Hands on experience in Testing APIs.
Knowledge of JAVA, HTML, CSS, SQL, and Javascript.
Knowledge of NodeJS is an added advantage.
Experience with QA automation techniques
Experience with SAAS application environments will be an added advantage.
Knowledge of database concepts and design (SQL, MongoDB, etc).
Experience of Creating and Implementing Test Cases.
Experience in Designing and Documenting Functional, Regression and cross-browser test plans.
Good English communication skills (written and verbal) is a must.
Should have knowledge on various testing tools and bug tracking systems (JIRA, Bugzilla)
Keywords: Computer science, automation framework, Software design, Analytical, HTML, Selenium, Test cases, JIRA, Bugzilla, SQL
